divs: Sighting DetailsAround 9:30 PM: On Staten Island Expressway at approach to Goethals Bridge. My brother and I first noticed the object to our right hovering over Elizabeth, New Jersey. It resembled a large helicopter, accompanying taillight and headlight,except for a large blue screen that seemed to envelop its starboard side. The object appeared weighed down by this screen and while it hovered it also appeared to be stationary in the sky. After crossing bridge and entering New Jersey, object gradually hovered towards the northeast.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Staten Island
There were no other sightings in Staten Island on or around August 28th 2012
Summary: Resembled hovering combination dirigible, helicopter with blue screen on starboard side.
